entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
